me.prettyprint.cassandra.serializers
Class AbstractSerializer<T>

java.lang.Object
  me.prettyprint.cassandra.serializers.AbstractSerializer<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializer<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanSerializer, ByteBufferSerializer, BytesArraySerializer, DateSerializer, DoubleSerializer, IntegerSerializer, LongSerializer, ObjectSerializer, StringSerializer, TypeInferringSerializer, UUIDSerializer
public abstract class AbstractSerializer<T>
extends Object
implements Serializer<T>

A base class for serializer implementations. Takes care of the default implementations of to/fromBytesList and to/fromBytesMap. Extenders of this class only need to implement the toBytes and fromBytes.

Author:
Ed Anuff
